data.actual_result: can attempt to upload file but get error.
data.expected_result: Upload feature removed when Send File permission is missing (as in the app).
data.short_description: "Paper Clip" icon is present and functional even without Send File perms.
data.steps_to_repro: - In the Android app, open a channel you can't upload a file to. - tap the Paper Clip. - Choose a file and add a message. - hit the Send button - "An unknown network error has occured".
